name: Breakfast Banana Green Smoothie
author: *Cozycook*
summary: Easy and simple, you'll have this smoothie in no time. This smoothie is packed with nutrients and vitamins. It's also perfect if you're in a hurry to get to work, rushing your kids to school (rushing yourself to school...like me), or just craving a fresh and healthy drink to start your day. Organic maple syrup can be added instead of honey.
ingredients: 2 cups baby spinach leaves, or to taste
1  carrot, peeled and cut into large chunks
¾ cup plain fat-free Greek yogurt, or to taste
directions: Put spinach, banana, carrot, yogurt, ice, and honey in a blender; blend until smooth
